code: @Parameters(name = "bean [{0}], employee [{1}]") public static String[][] employeeData() {     return new String[][] { { "employee1", "John Smith" }, { "employee2", "Jane Smith" } }. }

@Test public final void verifyPetAndEmployee() {     invocationCount.incrementAndGet().     // Verifying dependency injection:     assertNotNull("The pet field should have been autowired.", this.pet).     // Verifying 'parameterized' support:     Employee employee = this.applicationContext.getBean(this.employeeBeanName, Employee.class).     assertEquals("Name of the employee configured as bean [" + this.employeeBeanName + "].", this.employeeName, employee.getName()). }
@AfterClass public static void verifyNumParameterizedRuns() {     assertEquals("Number of times the parameterized test method was executed.", employeeData().length, invocationCount.get()). }
